Message.Title: What is the
Message.Msg: concern this morning ...No special divi has investors #$%$?
I'm concerned about international demand and a stronger dollar -- revenue growth is an issue. Not only for IBM. The Q3 reports from DOW, 3M and DuPont were weak.
Spoke to some guys at the Las Vegas iformation tec conference a month ago. They said 2015 is the seachange date for IBM

"Spoke to some guys at the Las Vegas iformation tec conference a month ago. They said 2015 is the seachange date for IBM" I have followed IBM since 1997 through all the big changes. IBM has built a model that has become very predictable -- a big reason why IBM's share buyback program has been so successful. I expect IBM to remain highly predictable -- it should earn $20 of operating EPS in 2015. I don't believe IBM's earnings will rocket one way or the other -- slow growth helped by the big R&D always underway.
